content: {"name": "The Salvation Army of Gwinnett County", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Serves Gwinnett county residents. Must bring ID or proof of Gwinnett residency.", "email": "", "url": "https://southernusa.salvationarmy.org/gwinnett/hunger-relief", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3455 Sugarloaf Parkway", "address_2": null, "city": "Lawrenceville", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30044", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.9250733, "longitude": -84.0176674}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 724-1677", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
